hero.title: Christian Festa
hero.subTitle: From system integrator to Director of Software Engineering, I’ve built a 15+ year career mastering the full SDLC. I lead mission-critical engineering teams to deliver scalable platforms, pioneer user-centric design systems that double productivity and ensure accessibility, and orchestrate multi-million-dollar programs with Agile precision to accelerate time-to-market. This holistic expertise enables me to align technical innovation with strategic objectives, delivering transformative solutions for Fortune 500 companies and government agencies that drive measurable growth and position organizations for long-term success.

heroCard.title: Principal UX Designer
heroCard.subTitle: Expert in crafting user-centric UX strategies and building complex design systems that ensure scalability, accessibility, and seamless integration. Led Figma-driven initiatives to double team productivity, enforce WCAG standards, and deliver enterprise-level interfaces that drive user engagement and operational efficiency.

heroCard.title: Director of Software Engineering
heroCard.subTitle: Technical leader overseeing software development and integration across the full SDLC, from architecture to deployment. Directed teams to accelerate delivery by up to 2x through modern technologies that help future-proof solutions, optimizing performance and aligning technical strategies with business goals.

heroCard.title: Technical Program Manager
heroCard.subTitle: Seasoned overseer of multiple concurrent, multi-million-dollar programs, from ideation to launch, using Agile methodologies to manage risks, budgets, timelines, and cross-functional teams. Excelled in stakeholder engagement and data-driven strategies that reduce time-to-market, mitigate issues, and ensure scalable, high-impact deliveries.

experience.title: Director of Software Engineering
experience.description: As Technical Delivery Manager and Principal Design Manager, I led the design, development, and integration (DDI) of a $40 million AWS-hosted public and admin portal, coordinating a team of over 30 designers, developers, and QA engineers.
bullets: Established a comprehensive Figma-based design system to standardize components, enforce WCAG compliance, and ensure device responsiveness, enabling seamless design handoffs and code reviews.

Directed onshore and offshore teams through the full project lifecycle, implementing best practices for testing workflows and achieving a phased rollout with the first phase live in just three months.
Mentored junior and senior designers while managing stakeholder relationships via weekly meetings and progress reports, aligning creative vision with business goals.
Post-launch, optimized the platform using user feedback and performance metrics, driving operational efficiency and positioning it as a cornerstone of the organization’s digital strategy.

experience.title: Technical Program and Design Manager
experience.description: As Technical Program Manager and Design Manager, I directed multiple workstreams across three of four solutions in a $100 million Google Cloud Platform-hosted portal project, managing a diverse team of over 30 professionals including designers, developers, business analysts, and testers across onshore and offshore locations.
bullets: Pioneered early Figma adoption and created a comprehensive Figma-based design system, accelerating the design process by more than 2x and doubling design team output.

Established UI/UX standards for standardization, WCAG compliance, and cross-device responsiveness, fostering cross-functional collaboration throughout the project lifecycle from requirements gathering to deployment.
Oversaw UX design processes, stakeholder workshops, and team coordination to deliver a scalable, user-friendly portal that enhanced customer service capabilities.
Provided strategic leadership to align project deliverables with organizational goals, ensuring efficient execution and long-term scalability.

experience.title: Technical Consultant
experience.organization: County Welfare Directors Association of California
experience.description: As a Technical Consultant on the Independent Verification and Validation (IV&V) team, I ensured successful integration of a complex multi-system environment for a high-profile public sector initiative.
bullets: Actively participated in system design, analyzed technical documentation, and identified potential risks and integration bottlenecks to maintain project timelines and performance.
Provided thorough reviews and sign-offs on technical documentation, recommending process optimizations to address issues before they escalated.
Collaborated with developers and stakeholders in biweekly reviews, presenting findings and securing buy-in for solutions while bridging technical and non-technical teams.
Contributed to delivering a reliable, integrated system that met all contractual obligations and served as a model for future initiatives.

experience.title: Technical Consultant
experience.description: Progressing from a college new hire to a managerial role over my tenure, I contributed to diverse projects including criminal justice, welfare, and grant management systems, wearing multiple hats across design, development, integration, and maintenance.
bullets: Established standards and protocols for multisystem case exchange, enabling seamless data sharing, and led implementation builds for successful deployments.
Designed and built in-house tools that streamlined workflows, reduced errors, and cut task completion time from hours to minutes.
Built and maintained regression suites, conducting rigorous testing to ensure system reliability and performance.
Co-authored winning proposals in business development, collaborating with experts to secure over $100 million in contracts.
Managed teams of up to 25 professionals in full system builds, configurations, third-party integrations, and user acceptance testing, driving operational excellence.
